Tasks.Task Description: Use monitoring tools to continuously check the health and performance of the Microsoft Purview Data Catalog. Identify and resolve any anomalies or issues.
Regularly review and validate data lineage information to ensure accuracy and completeness. Address any discrepancies or missing lineage data.
Conduct audits of metadata quality in the Purview Data Catalog to ensure compliance with organizational standards and policies.
Review and update data classification rules to align with evolving business requirements and regulatory changes.
Verify the security settings of Microsoft Purview, including access controls and encryption configurations, to ensure data protection.
Analyze and optimize analytics queries to improve performance and reduce resource consumption.
Regularly back up configuration settings and metadata stored in Microsoft Purview to ensure recoverability in case of data loss.
Organize training sessions for users and administrators to ensure familiarity with Microsoft Purview features and best practices.
Regularly review analytics dashboards to ensure they provide accurate and actionable insights. Update dashboards as needed.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare for potential security breaches or data integrity issues within Microsoft Purview.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Microsoft Purview's analytics features. Implement improvements based on this feedback.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure Microsoft Purview analytics operations adhere to relevant regulations and industry standards.
Keep Microsoft Purview analytics documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
